item.title: 气候波动可能会破坏您的一杯咖啡
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 云顶新加坡因盈利不佳股价跌至两年新低
item.description: 云顶新加坡有限公司（Genting Singapore Ltd.）第三季度业绩不佳，被分析师下调了股票评级，股价跌至两年来的最低点。【原文：Genting Singapore Ltd.’s shares fell to a two-year low after analysts downgraded the stock following lackluster third-quarter results from the firm.】

item.title: 印度将 12 亿美元绿色债务转入指数跟踪菜单
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：India made 100 billion rupees ($1.2 billion) of green bonds potentially eligible for inclusion in JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s flagship emerging market debt index, just months after having stoked controversy by removing some planned tenors.】

item.title: Meta 称应用程序商店应管理澳大利亚 16 岁以下儿童社交禁令
item.description: 尽管 Meta Platforms Inc. 呼吁澳大利亚考虑将监管社交媒体使用情况的责任移交给谷歌和苹果等应用商店运营商，但澳大利亚仍将继续推进禁止 16 岁以下青少年使用社交媒体的禁令。【原文：Australia will push ahead with a ban on social media for people aged under 16 despite calls by Meta Platforms Inc. for it to consider shifting responsibility for policing usage to app store operators such as Google and Apple.】

item.title: 全球航运真的能实现绿色发展吗？
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列Momentum的这一集中，我们将揭示一些引人注目的创新，这些创新可能会使碳排放严重的行业变得更加清洁。【原文：

On this episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Momentum, we uncover striking innovations that may make a carbon-heavy industry cleaner.

】

item.title: 蓬勃发展的离岸卢比债券市场将迎来创纪录的供应年
item.description: 印度离岸卢比债券市场今年卷土重来，世界银行和亚洲开发银行等发行人的交易将年度交易量推向了历史新高。【原文：India’s offshore rupee bond market has made a big comeback this year, with deals from issuers such as the World Bank and the Asian Development Bank pushing annual volumes to an all-time high.】

item.title: 交易员期待刺激政策，中国股市有望实现周线上涨
item.description: 周五结束的一次重要立法会议上，政府可能会推出更强有力的经济增长刺激措施，这一希望推动中国股市创下一个月以来的最佳单周表现。【原文：Chinese shares were headed for their best weekly showing in a month, aided by hopes that authorities may unveil stronger growth stimulus when a key legislature meeting concludes Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选引发完成芯片法补贴协议的竞赛
item.description: 拜登政府正抓紧时间与英特尔公司和三星电子公司等公司完成《芯片法案》协议的签署，旨在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普入主白宫之前巩固其标志性举措之一。【原文：The Biden administration is racing to complete Chips Act agreements with companies like Intel Corp. and Samsung Electronics Co., aiming to shore up one of its signature initiatives before President-elect Donald Trump enters the White House.】

item.title: 中国阿里巴巴、腾讯和京东将发布财报，可能的经济刺激计划成焦点
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司、腾讯控股有限公司和 JD.com Inc. 将很快公布财报，此前预计中国将签署可能是自大流行病以来刺激经济增长的最大一揽子财政计划。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd., Tencent Holdings Ltd. and JD.com Inc. will post earnings soon after China is expected to sign off on what could be its biggest fiscal package to spur growth since the pandemic.】

item.title: 中国授权银行在沙特阿拉伯销售美元现钞
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国已委托银行在沙特阿拉伯出售美元债券，这是自 2021 年以来中国首次发行美元债券。【原文：China has mandated banks for a dollar bond sale in Saudi Arabia, according to people familiar with the matter, its first issuance in the US currency since 2021.】

item.title: 中国债券市场关注重要立法会议的财政计划
item.description: 中国的债券交易商正在关注本周的一次重要立法会议，预计立法者将在会上批准一项价值数万亿元人民币的财政方案。【原文：China’s bond traders are watching a key legislative meeting this week where lawmakers are expected to approve a fiscal package worth trillions of yuan.】

item.title: 百度准备推出人工智能智能眼镜，与 Meta 的雷朋眼镜竞争
item.description: 百度公司即将推出一款内置人工智能助手的眼镜，与在人工智能硬件领域取得罕见成功的 Meta Ray-Bans 相抗衡。【原文：Baidu Inc. is set to unveil a pair of glasses with a built-in AI assistant, putting up a Chinese rival to the Meta Ray-Bans that have proven a rare success in AI-powered hardware.】

item.title: 交易商权衡利率前景和特朗普经济计划，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 在美联储降息和投资者评估唐纳德-特朗普入主白宫的影响之后，黄金在本周动荡的交易结束时保持涨势。【原文：Gold held a gain at the end of a volatile week’s trading, after the Federal Reserve reduced interest rates and investors assessed the implications of Donald Trump’s White House victory.】

item.title: 日产汽车债务违约风险升至 2023 年 3 月以来最高点
item.description: 在日本汽车制造商下调利润预期并宣布将解雇 9000 名员工后，衡量日产汽车公司信贷风险的一项指标跳涨。【原文：A gauge of Nissan Motor Co.’s credit risk jumped after the Japanese automaker slashed its profit outlook and announced it will dismiss 9,000 workers.】

item.title: 美国关税风险逼近，林吉特兑美元走强面临考验
item.description: 马来西亚林吉特是今年唯一对美元走强的亚洲新兴货币，但其表现可能会因唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选的风险而退步。【原文：Malaysia’s ringgit, the only emerging Asian currency to strengthen against the dollar this year, may see its performance ebb on risks from Donald Trump’s election win.】

item.title: 要维持 175% 的反弹势头，"海洋 "需要的不仅仅是良好的收益
item.description: 东南亚顶级在线购物公司 Sea Ltd. 的股价从 1 月份的低点反弹了 175%，在即将发布的第三季度财报中，该公司要想给投资者留下深刻印象，面临着很高的要求。【原文：After a peer-beating 175% stock rally from its January low, Southeast Asia’s top online-shopping company Sea Ltd. faces a high bar to impress investors with its upcoming third-quarter earnings report.】

item.title: 日本上季度两次干预使日元跌至 160 点以下
item.description: 日本表示，上一季度日本已两次进入外汇市场，鉴于近期日元再度疲软，越来越多的人猜测日本可能会酝酿更多举措。【原文：Japan said it stepped into the foreign exchange market twice last quarter, as speculation grows that more moves may be brewing given the recent bout of renewed yen weakness.】

item.title: 交易商消化特朗普胜选和美联储减息预期，石油有望实现周线上涨
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了即将上台的特朗普政府对原油供应的影响，以及美联储进一步下调美国利率，石油有望实现周线上涨。【原文：Oil was set for a weekly advance as traders weighed the impact of the upcoming Trump administration on crude supplies, and the Federal Reserve further cut US interest rates.】

item.title: 韩国誓言积极应对美国大选后的市场波动
item.description: 韩国表示，在决策者为唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫的影响做好准备之际，韩国将加强对金融市场的监控并 "积极 "应对，以缓解任何过度波动。【原文：South Korea said it will bolster its monitoring of financial markets and respond “actively” to ease any excessive volatility as policymakers brace for the implications of Donald Trump’s return to the White House.】

item.title: 阿波罗的 Atlas SP 新融资部门获得蓝筹评级
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Atlas SP Partners, the structured credit business of Apollo Global Management Inc., has set up a subsidiary that will borrow money, and three major bond graders have given blue-chip credit ratings to the unit.】

item.title: 好莱坞超级经纪人伊曼纽尔欲收购网球锦标赛和艺术博览会
item.description: 据知情人士透露，好莱坞超级经纪人阿里-伊曼纽尔（Ari Emanuel）正在筹集资金收购现场娱乐公司，其中可能包括他自己公司的一些部门。【原文：Hollywood superagent Ari Emanuel is raising money to buy live-entertainment businesses, including potentially some divisions of his own company, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储降息，股票和债券反弹：市场综述
item.description: 由于美联储降息，美国股市、债券和大宗商品跨资产反弹，周五亚洲股市将攀升。【原文：Asian equities were set to climb Friday after a cross-asset rally in the US lifted stocks, bonds and commodities as the Federal Reserve cut interest rates.】

item.title: 随着收入增长，快时尚零售商 Dynamite 申请 IPO
item.description: 服装零售商 Groupe Dynamite Inc. 向加拿大证券监管机构提交了首次公开募股的初步招股说明书，披露了收入和净利润的增长情况。【原文：Clothing retailer Groupe Dynamite Inc. filed a preliminary prospectus for an initial public offering with Canadian securities regulators, disclosing rising revenue and net income.】

item.title: 特朗普为何面临一场输给中国的科技战争
item.description:
在这部Bloomberg Originals迷你纪录片中，我们将展示当选总统计划中的贸易大炮可能不会产生他想要的效果。【原文：

In this Bloomberg Originals mini-documentary, we show how the president-elect’s planned trade salvos may not have the effect he intends.

】

item.title: 英伟达邀请前美国国家航空航天局太空中心主任埃伦-奥乔亚加入董事会
item.description: 全球价值最高的公司 Nvidia Corp. 任命美国国家航空航天局资深专家 Ellen Ochoa 为董事，将董事会成员扩大到 13 人。【原文：Nvidia Corp., the world’s most valuable company, named NASA veteran Ellen Ochoa as a director, expanding the size of its board to 13 members.】

item.title: 横滨银行考虑日本债券卷土重来，未来将进一步加息
item.description: 随着利率走高，日本最大的地区性银行之一热衷于重新购买该国的债券，这使得在多年海外投资之后，越来越多的金融机构开始权衡重返本地债务。【原文：One of Japan’s biggest regional banks is keen to resume buying the nation’s bonds as interest rates creep higher, adding to a growing line of financial institutions that are weighing a return to local debt after years of investing abroad.】

item.title: DraftKings 下调 2025 年销售额和利润预测，股价下跌
item.description: 最大的体育博彩公司之一 DraftKings Inc. 以第四季度开局不利为由，下调了 2024 年全年收入和利润预期。这一消息导致该公司股价在盘后交易中走低【原文：DraftKings Inc., one of the largest-sports betting companies, cuts its full-year estimate for 2024 revenue and profit, citing a tough start to the fourth quarter. The announcement sent the shares lower in extended trading】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省因成本和回报问题解雇养老金管理人的整个董事会
item.description: 艾伯塔省投资管理公司的整个董事会都被省政府解雇了，省政府称该资金管理公司增加了报酬和人员编制，但却没有产生可接受的回报。【原文：Alberta Investment Management Corp.’s entire board was sacked by the provincial government, which says the money manager has increased compensation and staffing but hasn’t produced acceptable returns.】

item.title: 季度收入低于预期，布洛克公司股价暴跌
item.description: 数字支付公司 Block Inc. 公布的第三季度营收低于分析师预期，该公司股价在尾盘交易中下跌约 10%。【原文：Shares of Block Inc. fell around 10% in late trading after the digital payments company posted third-quarter revenue that was below analysts’ forecasts.】

item.title: Expedia 上调全年业绩预期，预订毛额超预期
item.description: Expedia Group Inc.公布的第三季度总预订量好于预期，并表示将上调全年指导目标，这表明进入假期旺季后的需求比该公司之前想象的要强劲。【原文：Expedia Group Inc. posted better-than-expected grossing bookings in the third quarter and said it was raising its full-year guidance, suggesting that demand has proven stronger than the company had previously thought heading into the holiday season.】
